resources.string: select * from bphzhistory where isrember = \'0\' and dictindex <= \'%1$s\'
update bphzhistory set isrember =\'%1$s\' where dictindex = \'%2$s\'
select count(*) as count from bphzhistory where dictindex <= \'%1$s\'
select dictindex from bphzhistory where dictindex <= \'%1$s\' \'%2$s\' order by dictindex asc limit 1

select count(*) as countremb ,(select count(*) from bphzhistory where isrember = \'%1$s\' and dictindex <= \'%3$s\') as countunremb from bphzhistory where dictindex <= \'%3$s\' and isrember = \'%2$s\'
